entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
